info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 13 at 2:19PM PDT by NWS Hanford
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT EASTERN KERN COUNTY THROUGH 300 PM PDT... At 219 PM PDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Randsburg, or 16 miles south of Ridgecrest, moving west at 15 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor hail damage to vegetation is possible. Locations impacted include... Randsburg and Government Peak. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
